```{r import_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r reading_list, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
reading_list <- read_delim('reading-list.txt', delim = ",")
reading_list %>% mutate(year = lubridate::year(date_read)) %>% group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(ct = n(), avg_pages = mean(pages))
reading_list %>% mutate(year = lubridate::year(date_read)) %>% group_by(year, format) %>% 
  summarise(ct = n(), avg_pages = mean(pages))
reading_list %>% mutate(year = lubridate::year(date_read)) %>% group_by(year, genre) %>% 
  summarise(ct = n(), avg_pages = mean(pages))

```
